statements: DELETE FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE severity_level = 'High' AND patched = false;
DELETE FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE vulnerability_id = 100 AND severity_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE patched = FALSE;
DELETE FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High' AND affected_systems > 1000;
DELETE FROM patches WHERE applied = FALSE;
DELETE FROM patches WHERE vulnerability_id = 100 AND applied = TRUE;
DELETE FROM patches WHERE patch_id = 10 AND vulnerability_id = 3;
